name: Husar Labs
tagline: Internet of Things cloud software and hardware
description:
Husar Labs is a team of Internet of Things experts who deliver scalable and reliable M2M/IoT or Data Driven cloud applications, hardware and embedded firmware.
We created CloudThing.io IoT cloud platform and build solutions for our clients on top of it.
We use Golang, Docker, Kubernetes, NoSQL, Angular and several other technologies.
